items.title: Combining Data Skills, Knowledge, and Networks to Save our Planet
items.summary: To start this year fresh and inspired, we convened two gatherings of climate researchers, activists, and organisations to brainstorm ways to collaborate to make open climate data more usable, accessible, and impactful...

items.title: Frictionless response to NASA Earth mission science data processing

items.title: Libraries Hacked
items.summary: Libraries hacked is a project started in 2014 to promote the use of open data in libraries. That includes publishing data about libraries, as well as using other open datasets to enhance library data.
